title: FS: Lennox F. Scott Fitzgerald Stamp SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: Lennox F. Scott Fitzgerald Stamp SOLD
posts.post_content: For sale I have an Ed Lennox with a F. Scott Fitzgerald back stamp. Happy to answer any questions. Price assumes USPS shipping with tracking and delivery signature receipt confirmation. SOLD

I’ll take it!

Gorgeous card! Just arrived. Thanks again!
